model.name: MYSQL
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE employees ( emp_no integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`emp_no`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), birth_date date NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`birth_date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), first_name string(14) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`first_name`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), last_name string(16) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`last_name`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), gender string(2) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`gender`', NATIVE_TYPE 'ENUM', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), hire_date date NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`hire_date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(emp_no) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`PRIMARY`') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`employees`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE', CARDINALITY '300024');

model.name: MONGO
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE salaries ( "_id" object, emp_no integer, salary integer, from_date string, to_date string, CONSTRAINT PK0 PRIMARY KEY("_id") ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: EmployeeViewModel
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW EmpSalaries ( emp_no integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), first_name string(14) NOT NULL, last_name string(16) NOT NULL, salary integer, from_date date, to_date date, CONSTRAINT pkey PRIMARY KEY(emp_no) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT e.emp_no, e.first_name, e.last_name, s.salary, convert(s.from_date, date) AS from_date, convert(s.to_date, date) AS to_date FROM MYSQL.employees AS e INNER JOIN MONGO.salaries AS s ON e.emp_no = s.emp_no;
